General.Name: JMC Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: JMC Electronics Co., Ltd. produces reel to reel chip on film that is applied to LCD in Taiwan. The company was formerly known as Sumiko Electronics Taiwan Co., Ltd. and changed its name to JMC Electronics Co., Ltd. in 2014. JMC Electronics Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

1.Name: Ms. Hsing-Chen  Chen
1.Title: Mang. of Fin. and Accounting Department
